EmailTemplate.name: License Request Status Update
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce License Request Status Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Internal_Request__c.Requestor_Name__c},
There has been a change in your Salesforce Licence request status. Please view request status in the License Management Tool.
Request # {!Internal_Request__c.Name}
If you have any questions please send an email to licenserequests@auspost.com.au
Regards, Customer Systems Team
